website_summaries.verdict: An antiperspirant that goes on clear and provides outstanding odor protection.
pros: Offers all-day protection against excessive sweating and wetness
Features a neutral scent that makes the skin smell fresh and clean
Offers a wonderful choice for those who are dealing with sensitive skin
cons: Tends to clump to the armpits
Can be difficult to wash off the antiperspirant

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a pack of 6 and received 1 in this package
customer_reviews.text: No contact information to file a claim/dispute regarding this purchase. Received shipment today & only had 1 of the 6 I purchased. No bundling, no messed up shrink wrap showing that 5 other units were somehow removed. Just 1 unit and the order was for 6 in total. Very disappointed & just want to receive the remaining 5 units. Overall this is the 1st issue I've had with any Amazon order ever, and quite honestly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Softer smell than the gel version
customer_reviews.text: As a woman i found all the sudden no deodorants were lasting as long anymore so I started wearing my husband's (the gel version of this one). Well he wasn't a fan of me smelling like a dude and I wasn't a fan of burning my pits off after shaving so after trying different old spice scents I finally found the powder version. Something about the powder makes it come off less manly and a little softer. Don't get me wrong this is still a stronger more manly scent but it does the job and I'm not smelling awful anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son requested, Mother approved!
customer_reviews.text: Old Spice is actually in style again... very cool. My 18-year-old son requested Old Spice, I was surprised he did. I remember it as a kid being the traditional gift for my dad at Christmas time. I liked the new scents and so happy the trusted brand added other scents to the line up. The price was amazing here on Amazon, so I went for the 6 pack. Great to have one at home, school, workout bag.... now no excuse for him not to smell great all the time.
customer_reviews.author: DawnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice, but doesn't last long for me
customer_reviews.text: I've found the longevity of this product really isn't there. I find it wearing off after 6 hours or less. I have Swagger by Old Spice as well and that seems to last the entire day. I've also used Fiji by Old Spice and it lasts the whole day too. I don't know if these sticks were just bad or old, but I've had much better luck with other scents.
customer_reviews.author: Richard N.

customer_reviews.title: Old spice is very nice
customer_reviews.text: Good as heck for the price. Antiperspirant and deodorant is what anyone needs. Don’t simply just get something that says deodorant, all deodorant does is give a scent. Antiperspirant keeps you from not smelling like a behemoth
customer_reviews.author: Ali C

customer_reviews.title: Listed under important information, the active ingredient is listed ...
customer_reviews.text: Listed under important information, the active ingredient is listed as 19%. When receiving the product it is actually 17%- just FYI for those who need a higher % of Aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: MomDadHeidi

customer_reviews.title: Not good as expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product sometime back, it was in a deal so I thought lets I should give a try. Initially, it works great but after using couples of times, when you rotate its bottom dial deodorant doesn't come up so not easy to use. Also deodorant stick also broken when it is left almost half so not pretty happy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: He thought I was crazy for buying so much but I feel like every other day he was saying he needed more ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He thought I was crazy for buying so much but I feel like every other day he was saying he needed more deodorant. I think he just puts them somewhere and then can’t find them but he likes the smell and they seem to work great. Will probably be enough deodorant for a while but I won’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Kerstin Kemper

customer_reviews.title: Missing five sticks
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this six pack of deodorant for years and this is the first time I have been disappointed. I only received one stick of deodorant instead of the six that’s supposed to come.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good value, decent scent, lasts the full 24hrs
customer_reviews.text: A very good, basic antiperspirant, cheaper deal than most retail stores. It's not overwhelming strong, I usually cover it up with a cologne. Lasts a long time, put it on after my morning shower, and the following morning before my shower it still has a nice scent, and the water resistance holds just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Payne

customer_reviews.title: This is antiperspirant.....Do Not Order if you're allergic to antiperspirant ingredients
customer_reviews.text: The description does not say that this is antiperspirant. I notified Amazon that the listing is incorrect and asked for replacement but go the same thing. please FIX this listing!
customer_reviews.author: Wm

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I have wore many deodorants that would last me all day working outside and then exercising afterwards having only been applied once heavy in the morning. This deodorant smells great but does a mediocre job at being an antiperspirant. Most days I find myself simply sweating through it after only being outside a few minutes at a time. It's not a real deal breaker because I can apply it as often as I want since I bought 2 of these packs for ridiculously cheap but it's still the idea that this is an antiperspirant and deodorant and should make a modest attempt at both.
customer_reviews.author: RyansChilling

customer_reviews.title: Hockey player approved
customer_reviews.text: Wow, my husband smells like a DREAM. Everyon notices too. We were swimming at a friends house and when he ran outside and jumped in the pool, everyone was like - wow, someone smells awesome. And this was hours after application and in the POOL. My husband is a proffessional hockey player and pretty much sweats A LOT. This is the one product that works the best for his sweat problem.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: A great product that works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Old Spice Deodorant for Men because I've used it before and knew it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Old man

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better!
customer_reviews.text: The fresh antiperspirant and deodorant from Old Spice is the only item that I trust to use. It keeps me dry and smelling great all day. Other products don't keep me dry and/or smell wayyyyy too much. This is just the right amount. Only item I trust!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both like this same deodorant. This value pack lasts us a long time!
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: This has been the best deodorant/antiperspirant for my son
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best deodorant/antiperspirant for my son. He has always had issues with sweating and odor. This one works amazing!! He is very happy with it also. Doesn't matter if at school, working out or at work it keeps up with his activity.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Order incomplete on first try...
customer_reviews.text: Got 1 out of 6 on first delivery of a 6 pack, confused? Greatly.....
customer_reviews.author: Michalek

customer_reviews.title: Best Anti Perspirant PERIOD!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many Anti-Perspirants... All of them leave me under arms feeling uncomfortable. Or itchy. Or worse of all, the protection doesn't last as long as advertised and my poor colleagues are treated to my natural scent. Trust me it sucks. But these Old Spice are perfect! None of the above happen, and it's the only Anti-Perspirant that works the full 24 hours (sometimes longer). Best thing on the market for men's hygiene!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Works well and smells great.
customer_reviews.text: When my husband forgets to use this days he hangs out at home it’s noticeable and he ends up needing to take a shower mid day! With it you would never know he was out in 100 degree weather mowing the yard! Works well and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Only received 1 deodorant - paid $19 for package of 6
customer_reviews.text: The same thing happened to us as happened to a previous reviewer- No contact information to file a claim/dispute regarding this purchase. Shipment only had 1 of the 6 purchased items. How do I receive the other 5 that I paid for??
customer_reviews.author: M Jane Hedges

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what happened with this, but when I got it in the grocery store, it worked fine. I purchased this, and it didn’t work at all. Sweat right through it, and odor is apparent.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great smell and it lasts a long time. The pack is great price!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Old Spice Powder deodorant
customer_reviews.text: Great buy on Old Spice deodorant. I like the powder and the larger container. The larger quantity container is easy to use and provides access to the entire contents. Other deodorant containers have the feed mechanism fall out before the contents are used.
customer_reviews.author: Mule

customer_reviews.title: The price was right
customer_reviews.text: The price was right for the deodorant that I like. Buying the logic quantity and saving the price was the best single thing they have.
customer_reviews.author: J D.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: One of my boyfriend’s favorite deodorants. He does wish it lasted longer though.
customer_reviews.author: Thaissa Braga

customer_reviews.title: Same quality as in stores, but much less expensive
customer_reviews.text: Great price on a great product. I have been buying this solid in the store for years, when I found it on Amazon at this great price I had to try it. Same product, much better price, no complaints! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: WTK00

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I think this was a great deal ! Update: Well it seems the price has changed on this item so not so interested and not such a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: ... changed the way this smells cuz it doesn't smell like it used to
customer_reviews.text: I guess Old Spice changed the way this smells cuz it doesn't smell like it used to. Time to find another scent
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: Good product, disappointed with order process
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but not the way I got it. I did not receive six as expected and it was opened. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Josue Torrens

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me dry and odor free
customer_reviews.text: No strong scent, applies easily and then you forget you put it on
customer_reviews.author: unobservant customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this product and definitely the scent is awesome but ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and definitely the scent is awesome but I do like the gel product over this compressed white bar, which is a little dry on the application side of things.
customer_reviews.author: F. Ober

customer_reviews.title: I’ve got to say this deodorant changed the way puberty ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got to say this deodorant changed the way puberty affected my son! Anyone with a kid that is experiencing a somewhat stinky puberty use this! Really.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Value for money, works great and smells great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product for all day freshness and keeps me dry, the scent is great too not to strong but you can smell it all day long, great price
customer_reviews.author: Uceil Parker

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite antiperspirant. It is fresh smelling and unobtrusive
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite antiperspirant. It is fresh smelling and unobtrusive, and don't leave much residue on clothing. This was a particularly good deal for six sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Max Ellithorpe

customer_reviews.title: The scent is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he loves them and the scent is amazing. This is the white solid deodorant not the gel blue one.
customer_reviews.author: Serita

customer_reviews.title: I gave this a try and I’m pretty sure my shirt is dryer without
customer_reviews.text: Simply does not work as an antiperspirant. I’ve used the “hard gel” stick in the past that kept me dry, but it would give me chemical burns under my arms. I gave this a try and I’m pretty sure my shirt is dryer without...so, now I’ve got six of these...
customer_reviews.author: Kyle A Casey

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize it was the white chaulky version. White stuff all over my clothes
customer_reviews.author: rwh

customer_reviews.title: Nice smelling grave
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is probably giving me cancer, but at least I'll smell good.
customer_reviews.author: Philly Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Same deodorant you get at the store but there's at least a 6 month supply here for a fraction of the price and unmatchable convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Cody S.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: They actually come with a red cap and not the white cap which is the better kind of old spice. But the deodorant holds up fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Keehl

customer_reviews.title: Broken Product
customer_reviews.text: 3 out of the 6 sticks had broken rollers that would unscrew and not be able to go up anymore than the first application. Unfortunate as I have sensitive skin and this is one of the few deodorants that don’t make me break out in a rash. I struggle to find it now in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: The best smelling Old Spice hands down! Lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: I was expectinga 6 pack of the Old Spice Fresh Scent clear High Endurance, instead, I received “Swagger”. WTF is that???? Top it all off, I can’t return it for the correct scent I originally wanted. This is first and last time I’ll be ordering from these sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, doesn’t flake all over, doesn’t irritate my armpits.

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and works well
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this deodorant for many, many years. It smells great and lasts a full day.

customer_reviews.title: Check the label when you first get it
customer_reviews.text: This product says in a deodorant and anti-perspirant. But when delivered it said it was only a deodorant.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price

customer_reviews.title: Great product, my son made me give him 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my son made me give him 2 bars. It has worked for 2 days before with issues. Will purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: My husband can’t use any type of gel or transparent deodorant because of irritation. This Old Spice does the trick!

customer_reviews.title: Great deodorant at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great deodorant at a great price! I purchase these for my teenage son and it works good. Goes on smooth and doesn't clump or grease up.

customer_reviews.title: Less price more variety on smell, and stronger vapour
customer_reviews.text: I liked its a deodarant for men smells good but not strong. Need more vapour

customer_reviews.title: The scent has changed

customer_reviews.title: Substituted scent
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a different scent. This scent was substituted without my consent. It is not returnable so I will be donating it.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a fake product. It doesn’t smell anything like the store-bought old spice “fresh”! It doesn’t work nearly as well either and it’s not eligible for return. Buyer beware!

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Buy in bulk!
customer_reviews.text: At the time of purchase this was cheaper than buying individually from the store.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed with this deodorant, for being a 24 hr anti persperant and deodorant it might work for three hrs. I kinda expected more from old spice. And it marks my clothes, you have to be super careful or else it leaves white streaks.

customer_reviews.title: I've tried many deodorants but always come back to Old ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many deodorants but always come back to Old Spice Fresh. And this 6-pack just makes it that much more affordable.

customer_reviews.text: Only received 1 stick of deodorant in my package. No sign of the other 5 being taken out. Can’t find a way to contact anyone to solve this.

customer_reviews.text: Looks/smells like regular product but does NOT work. Long time Old Spice user and I will not be purchasing from them again. Zero star rating.

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for years - better than the new series
customer_reviews.text: After trying out several different deodorants I finally settled on the Old Spice solid deodorants, since they did the job without having an overpowering smell. The new "Fiji", "Denali", etc... series of deodorants tend to have a strong, over-powering smell that can get up your nostrils, so I liked the fact that this series does the job of deodorizing, and does it well. After you apply the deodorant, it is mostly invisible, except if you were to apply overly liberal doses of it, and so will not stain your tee or shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Abhinav Agarwal

product_meta.title: Old Spice Deodorant for Men, Long Lasting Fresh, High Endurance, Robust Greens Scent, 3 Oz (Packaging may vary) (Pack of 6)
product_meta.description:
Style:FreshUsing this is like chumming the air for pretty ladies who are doctors that supermodel in their spare time. They wont be able to see the source of the square-jawed quarterbackliness hanging in the air until they start biting on you. And by then, its way too late for them. Active Ingredient: Aluminum zirconium trichlorohydrex Gly 17% (anhydrous) Antiperspirant. Inactive ingredients cyclopentasiloxane, stearyl alcohol, mineral oil, dimethicone, talc, petrolatum, hydrogenated castor oil, PPG-14 butyl ether, fragrance, behenyl alcohol.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


This is an Old Spice Anti-Perspirant & Deodorant you will find in the medicine cabinets of haunted houses. That’s because it’s spooky how good it works. It goes on clear, and lasts all day. Don’t be frightened by its manly, yet invisible power. Odor protection lasts all day, even into your graveyard shift at the plant. Old Spice High Endurace Anti-Perspirant & Deodorant.

AT A GLANCE
 * Hidden underarm power
 * It goes on clear
 * High-performing odor protection

FOR A TRUE OLFACTORY EXPERIENCE, TRY THEM TOGETHER
You can't get enough of this scent. But you can try.

Long-Lasting Stick Anti-Perspirant & Deodorant
Long-lasting. Stick.

Body Wash
Drop-kicks dirt and odor

Clear Gel
Long lasting but clear

Long-Lasting Stick Deodorant
A scent with staying power

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
MANLY SCENTS TO CHOOSE FROM
What are the pros of procuring this product?

 * It plants a flag of fragrance high atop your man mountain
 * It gives heart to the weak, while striking fear into your enemies
 * It smells like cobra fangs
 * It allows you to mark large geographical areas with your scent and increase your dominion
 * It increases your ability to sense other dimensions
 * It makes you feel like a delicious meatball sandwich for women
 * It makes larger mammals fear you
 * It allows you to save small animals using only your man scent

What are the cons of procuring this product?

 * It incites an unmistakable urge to wrestle large animals
 * It creates a desire to climb tall mountains simply because they exist
 * It smells too manly
 * Its manly scent causes people to assume you’re an astronaut able to answer aerospace queries

What if my current soap isn’t manly enough?
Try Old Spice Body Wash.

What if I smell like a turtle cage?
Try Old Spice Deodorant.

What if I want to slap the smell of America on my face?
